name: Hatchling (Laminated Lizard)
description:
Hatchling is a realtime puppet controlled by you. A curious tiny bird who just wants to be friends.

There are no tasks to do - it's just a relaxing game. Enjoy the calming sounds of nature, and make the hatchling look surprised, tired, curious - or let it inspect the mystical object (controlled by the mouse). 

Controls

Currently controller only. PlayStation controller scheme:

  • Rotate head: Left stick
  • Tilt body: Right stick
  • Chirp: X or R2
  • Blink: L2
  • Eyebrows: L1/R1
  • Flap wings: Square
  • Toggle look at camera or object: Triangle
  • Toggle object: Circle
  • Toggle controller info: Start

Move the object with your mouse - toggle object by right-clicking.

Tested on Windows with 8Bitdo controller. Probably works with other controllers too.
